tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE refugee_demographics (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR,
    age INT,
    country_of_origin VARCHAR,
    gender VARCHAR,
    location VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE RefugeeDemographics (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    country_of_origin VARCHAR(255),
    status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE RefugeeLocations (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_name VARCHAR(255),
    population INT,
    latitude DECIMAL(9,6),
    longitude DECIMAL(9,6)
);

CREATE TABLE refugee_demographics (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    nationality VARCHAR(50),
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    ethnicity VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE location_data (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    country VARCHAR(50),
    city VARCHAR(50),
    region VARCHAR(50),
    latitude DECIMAL(10, 8),
    longitude DECIMAL(11, 8)
);

CREATE TABLE analysis_data (
    analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    refugee_id INT,
    location_id INT,
    analysis_date DATE,
    analysis_result VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE refugee_demographics (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  country_of_origin VARCHAR(100),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  occupation VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE refugee_locations (
  location_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  latitude DECIMAL,
  longitude DECIMAL,
  city VARCHAR(100),
  country VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE refugees (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  country_of_origin VARCHAR(50),
  country_of_residence VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE refugee_locations (
  location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location_name VARCHAR(100),
  region VARCHAR(50),
  country VARCHAR(50),
  population INT
);

CREATE TABLE refugee_education (
  education_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  level VARCHAR(50),
  institution VARCHAR(100),
  completion_year INT,
  refugee_id INT REFERENCES refugees(id)
);

CREATE TABLE refugee_health (
  health_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  refugee_id INT REFERENCES refugees(id),
  medical_condition VARCHAR(100),
  treatment_status VARCHAR(50),
  treatment_start_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE refugee_employment (
  employment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  refugee_id INT REFERENCES refugees(id),
  job_title VARCHAR(100),
  employer VARCHAR(100),
  salary DECIMAL(10, 2)
);
